ksql: CREATE TABLE conversations_table ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, owner_id BIGINT) WITH ( KAFKA_TOPIC = 'postgres.chat.conversations', VALUE_FORMAT = 'JSON', KEY_FORMAT = 'JSON'); CREATE STREAM participants_stream ( id BIGINT, conversation_id BIGINT, participant_id BIGINT) WITH ( KAFKA_TOPIC = 'postgres.chat.participants', VALUE_FORMAT = 'JSON'); CREATE STREAM participants_stream_rekeyed WITH (PARTITIONS = 1) AS SELECT * FROM participants_stream PARTITION BY conversation_id; CREATE TABLE participants_by_conversation WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='kafka.chat.participants_by_conversation', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON') AS SELECT conversation_id, COLLECT_LIST(participant_id) AS participant_ids FROM participants_stream_rekeyed GROUP BY conversation_id; CREATE TABLE conversation_owner_participants_table WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='kafka.chat.conversation_owner_participants_table', VALUE_FORMAT='JSON') AS SELECT c.id AS conversation_id, c.owner_id, p.participant_ids FROM conversations_table c LEFT JOIN participants_by_conversation p ON c.id = p.conversation_id; CREATE STREAM messages_stream (id BIGINT, conversation_id BIGINT, sender_id BIGINT, content STRING) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC = 'postgres.chat.messages', VALUE_FORMAT = 'JSON'); CREATE STREAM messages_stream_rekeyed WITH (PARTITIONS = 1) AS SELECT * FROM messages_stream PARTITION BY conversation_id; CREATE STREAM message_recipients AS SELECT m.id AS id, m.conversation_id AS conversation_id, AS_VALUE(m.conversation_id) AS conversation_id_dup, m.sender_id AS sender_id, m.content AS content, EXPLODE(p.participant_ids) AS participant_id FROM messages_stream_rekeyed m JOIN participants_by_conversation p ON m.conversation_id = p.conversation_id;
